events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on the highway causing front bumper damage.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the details of the car collision submitted.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the auto accident claim and assist the customer throughout the process.
The customer was notified that their claim has been received and acknowledged by the insurance company successfully.
Requested the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and the customerâ€™s driver license to process the claim further.
The customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the collision and official police report.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle accident has commenced to validate the claim details and liability.
The investigation has been completed successfully confirming the circumstances of the auto accident as reported.
A settlement amount has been proposed to cover the vehicle repairs and related damages from the collision.
Customer confirmed acceptance of the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the handling of the claim.
The claim has been formally approved by the insurance company based on the findings and agreement with the customer.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued to the customer for vehicle repair expenses.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed following the payment and final confirmation from the customer.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived in the company system for future reference and compliance.
